snippet: New York police are searching for a man seen hurling a smoke bomb at diners seated outdoors at a trendy Italian restaurant frequented by celebrities in Manhattan's Greenwich Village....

headline.print_headline: Man Sought for Smoke-Bombing Trendy Greenwich Village Restaurant
headline.main: Man Sought for Smoke-Bombing Trendy Greenwich Village Restaurant

lead_paragraph: New York police are searching for a man seen hurling a smoke bomb at diners seated outdoors at a trendy Italian restaurant frequented by celebrities in Manhattan's Greenwich Village.
